about_the_game:
Industry Gallery

This Industry-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is of a different industry in action!

Heavy machinery, highly skilled and vital to our day-to-day life!

Contents

The Industry gallery unlocks the following images:
  • Healthcare
  • Construction
  • Communications
  • Science
  • Games
  • Hauling
  • Stonks
  • Renewables
  • Film
  • Law
  • Forklift
  • Oil Fields
  • Food
  • Fashion
  • Quarry
  • Timber
  • Office
  • Suez
  • Tool Board
  • Production Line
  • Combine

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: WooLoop - Industry Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: This Industry-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is of a different industry in action! Heavy machinery, highly skilled and vital to our day-to-day life!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
